QuestData.Title: Post-partum Aggression
QuestData.Description: Broodmother Slivina's likely to be a snarling ball of teeth, spikes, and talons. You've gone and stolen her children away and no mother takes kindly to that.$B$B'Tis true they hatched from eggs, but she loves the little beasts no less than your mother loves you.$B$BShe'll be desperate and fierce in equal measures, everything Hemet loves in a target. You and he, along with that mammoth, should be a match for her.$B$BShe's on her perch at the northern edge of the Savage Thicket and hungers for revenge.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Broodmother Slivina and return to Dorian Drakestalker at Dorian's Outpost.
QuestData.CompletionText: Well, you're alive. How did you fare?
QuestData.RewardText: Well, I had a whole speech prepared, but the old man himself has some words he wants to say to you.
